I moved from Johns Hopkins University to the Imaging & Visualization department at Siemens Corporate Research, Princeton, New Jersey in November 95. Contact information . A PostScript version of my (outdated) resume is here . As a guest at this site, it is your moral obligation to check it out! You may also retrieve the compressed PostScript files for individual chapters or the whole thesis. Free Software Steven Salzberg, Simon Kasif and I distribute the OC1 decision tree software system.
